Text:
function ERU_EP04_17()
    -- .転-1【12月第2週】「姫神ダリアｖｓ伊草エリカ」
    SaveData.Title = "姫神ダリアｖｓ伊草エリカ"

    -- //BG：姫神邸廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ba")
    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    --吉　イベントができたら調整
    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・ダリア・背景差分）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ I faced Daria-san who stood in my way and clenched my fist. ]])

    MSG([[ To be throwing punches with a former friend in a hallway so identical to where I usually walk with my friends. ]])

    MSG([[ What a complicated feeling this is. It's so frustrating. ]])

    MSG([[ But even so, I can’t lower my fists here. ]])

    MSG([[ To understand her true feelings beneath all those lies, I must fight seriously. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2263.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“If you won’t let me pass, then I’ll push through!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0653.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“If you think you can get through, then try.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0654.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“But today I’m serious. No one will get to meet Hermes!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（接近するダリア・背景差分）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ No sooner said than done, Daria-san rushed towards me. ]])

    MSG([[ She’s skilled. Because she targeted my breathing gap, my reaction was delayed for a moment. ]])

    MSG([[ Facing someone of Daria-san’s caliber, that delay could be fatal. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2264.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“I-Igusa style――” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0655.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“Too slow.” ]])

    MSG([[ As expected, she grabbed my arm. ]])

    MSG([[ As I thought, "This is bad," I desperately tried to think of a way to counter— ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢⇒正答なし。何を選んでも敗北する負けイベント

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_1_ERU,"ダリアさんの技から抜け出す方法は？")

    MSG([[ —No good. No matter how I move, it’s like she’s reading and countering it. ]])

    MSG([[ While hesitating, my leg was sharply swept— ]])

    -- //effect：画面が上下反転
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013ba")
    LAYER_ANGLE(LAYER_BG,180)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)


    -- //SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask032", 500,false)
    -- //effect：明滅
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2265.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“Ugh…!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ A pitiful scream slipped out. I can't afford to show pain. I have to get away immediately! ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・ダリア・背景差分）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Before she could follow up, I rolled backward and used the momentum to quickly get up. ]])

    -- //SE：打撃音
PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
WAIT(400)

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0019.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“You’re fast~ like a scared little kitten.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san sneered as she swung her fist down on the floor where I had just fallen. ]])

    MSG([[ That was dangerous. If I’d been daydreaming, that strike would have ended it. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt this way when we fought at Akira’s house too, but compared to when we sparred just for fun before, her strength is on a different level. ]])

    MSG([[ So this is what the ‘Battle Princess’ means when she’s serious. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2266.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
(It’s like she knows exactly what I’ll do next… How am I supposed to counter that?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Though we’ve only exchanged a few moves, I’ve already figured out what supports her strength. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s her extraordinary “dynamic vision.” After Akira researched side-guard techniques, we learned it’s a martial art specialized in reading opponents’ movements from their eyes and limbs. ]])

    MSG([[ Using those sharp eyes, Daria-san reads and shuts down my movements. ]])

    MSG([[ Since my movements are predictable, I naturally hesitate to attack. I can’t close the distance to reach her with my fists. ]])

    MSG([[ What should I do? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0656.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“What’s the point of panicking and keeping your distance? You won’t beat me if you don’t get closer.” ]])

    MSG([[ As if sensing my impatience, Daria-san beckoned with her palm, provoking me with a smirk. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s a trap. Daria-san’s technique specializes in counterattacks. She’s trying to lure me into moving and attacking. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0657.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“To pity someone who betrayed you… You really are Marika’s little brother. It’s only natural such foolishness will ruin you.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2267.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“You think Marika-neesan is… foolish?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ An obvious provocation. Bringing Marika-neesan into this like that showed she understands my personality well. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I know I shouldn’t move with my head, I can never forgive those words. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2268.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“I don’t mind if you insult me. I know I’m foolish. But even so…” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2269.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“Don’t you dare insult Marika-neesan!!!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I kicked off the ground with full force and closed the distance in an instant. ]])

    MSG([[ I used my stiffened arm as a shield and charged at her with all my strength—‘Housenka’. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how good Daria-san is at Aikido, a woman’s arm strength shouldn’t be able to stop this. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m way behind in tactical reading anyway. Then I’ll push through with pure power—my advantage in raw strength due to gender! ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0658.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“That hot-headedness doesn’t run in the family. You’re nothing like Marika.” ]])

    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・ダリア・背景差分・エリカ消失）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001ac")
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2270.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“Huh!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The moment I touched Daria-san, my body felt light. ]])

    MSG([[ She used my charge’s momentum to catapult me like a ball through the air. ]])

    MSG([[ —This is bad! If she slams me into the floor from this state— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2271.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“Ugh…!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0659.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“Gah!?” ]])

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ I wildly kicked in mid-air. The unexpected attack landed on Daria-san’s shoulder, staggering her. ]])

    MSG([[ But that was as much resistance as I could manage. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0660.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“I’m rather weak, but what about your weight combined with the speed of your fall?” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san touched my floating body and accelerated it forcefully towards the floor— ]])

    -- //SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(400)
    -- //SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask031", 300,false)
    -- //effect：明滅
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ I took a tremendous impact all over, and my vision flickered. I was slammed hard against the floor from the air. ]])

    MSG([[ The floor seemed to shake beneath me. My legs wavered. I had to stand, but my legs and hips wouldn’t respond. My vision warped and twisted. ]])

    MSG([[ It was like I was the only one caught in a massive earthquake. ]])


STOP_BGM(1000)

    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //effect：セピア加工
    -- //BG：繁華街

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
“Minachan, watch out!” ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

    MSG([[ —Right. I feel like this happened once before. ]])

    MSG([[ Back then, the ground was shaking and I couldn’t move. ]])

    MSG([[ In such a terrifying situation, there was someone protecting me. ]])

    MSG([[ And that person shielded me— ]])

    -- //effect：画面が徐々に赤く
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BG000ac")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    --LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    ---LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,10000,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",3000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2272.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
(I can’t protect the people important to me again...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I struggled to stand, but I had no strength. I couldn’t even keep my eyelids open. ]])

    -- //BG：黒バック

    MSG([[ But even so, I desperately kept moving my hands and feet. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0661.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“You still have consciousness… You’re stubborn. As an act of mercy, I’ll finish you off.” ]])

    MSG([[ In my blacked-out vision, I heard Daria-san’s tone full of pity. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0662.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
“Goodbye, Battle Princess.” ]])

    -- //SE：打撃音
PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2273.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
“Ugh…” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As I felt a stabbing pain in my abdomen, my consciousness suddenly snapped shut.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_18")
end
